sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ProblemMigrationHelperUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>The migration api for Problem Migration Utility shipped in global scope to set setWorkflow(false)</description>
        <name>ProblemMigrationHelperUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ProblemMigrationHelperUtils = Class.create();
ProblemMigrationHelperUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	updateRecord: function(record){
		var tblName = record.getTableName() + '';
		if (tblName === 'problem' || tblName === 'problem_task'){
			record.setWorkflow(false);
			if (record.update())
				return true;
			else
				return false;
		}
		else
			gs.warn('Not a Problem or Problem Task record');
	},

    type: 'ProblemMigrationHelperUtils'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-03-30 07:00:00</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>453353a653330010d6a4ddeeff7b12fe</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ProblemMigrationHelperUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Problem Management" source="com.snc.problem">42e0458b6d2620100acb70b353433097</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_453353a653330010d6a4ddeeff7b12fe</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-04-08 08:12:33</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>473</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
